name: finalproject-api
description: API for the final project in WAI.

scripts.start: concurrently "nodemon -e js --watch app --watch index.js" "cd ../reactjs && npm start"
scripts.migrate: cd app && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli

author: TJ Clement
